mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, HOME_PATH PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, REG_DT FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT ID, NAME, HOME_PATH, PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, REG_DT FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, NAME, HOME_PATH, PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, REG_DT FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND PRIORITY = #{priority}
SELECT ID, NAME, HOME_PATH, PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, REG_DT FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId} ORDER BY PRIORITY ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, HOME_PATH, PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, REG_DT FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND NAME = #{name}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PATH = #{path}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY ( ID, NAME, HOME_PATH, PATH, PRIORITY, IN_USE, GROUP_ID, REG_ID, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_IP ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL(SEQ_IAAP_CM_DIRECTORY), #{name}, #{homePath}, #{path}, #{priority}, #{inUse}, #{groupId}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, #{updId}, #{updIp} )
